titles.title: I see Christ in you and you see Christ in me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I see Christ in you; and you see Christ in me.
Praise the Lord, praise the Lord. (2x)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
This is life; all other things are death.
Praise the Lord, praise the Lord. (2x)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I will pray for you; and you will pray for me, etc. (2x)
God will hear us by His Holy Ghost, etc. (2x)

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I will live in you and you will live in me, etc. (2x)
This is life, all other things are death, etc. (2x)

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Perfection is my goal, my Jesus told me so, etc. (2x)
Sons of God, lift your vision high, etc. (2x)

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Yo veo a Cristo en ti
Tu ves a Cristo en mi
/Gloria a Dios/ (2)

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Esto es vida y lo demás es muerte
/Gloria a Dios/ (2)

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Yo voy a orar por ti,
Tu vas a orar por mí
/Gloria a Dios/ (2)

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
Yo veo vida en ti…
Yo veo un cambio en ti…
Yo veo amor en ti…
